# Best wireless earbuds and headphones in 2020 to shop for

The best wireless earbuds include everyday use, fitness-forward and budget-
friendly options from Apple, Sony, Jaybird and more.

![Portrait of mature businessman listening to music with bluetooth
earbuds](https://media4.s-nbcnews.com/j/newscms/2020_17/3315931/200420-stock-
airpods-main-ew-341p_1eac9284ca3f5814fe347840b3439387.fit-760w.jpg)

“True wireless” refers to Bluetooth-enabled earbuds that have zero wires
whatsoever. While some Bluetooth headphones — or in-ear buds or earbuds or
'buds — still have a wire connecting the two earbuds to each other, true
wireless 'buds are literally two standalone earbuds.Westend61 / Getty
Images/Westend61

Dec. 1, 2019, 4:51 PM UTC / Updated April 17, 2020, 7:08 PM UTC

By Whitson Gordon

Our editors independently selected these items because we think you will enjoy
them and might like them at these prices. If you purchase something through
our links, we may earn a commission. Pricing and availability are accurate as
of publish time. [Learn more about Shop
TODAY](https://www.nbcnews.com/shopping/lifestyle/everything-you-need-know-
about-shopping-powered-shop-today-n1061641).

If you’re not used to working from home, you may realize it can come with some
unexpected distractions. Due to [stay-at-home
orders](https://www.nbcnews.com/health/health-news/here-are-stay-home-orders-
across-country-n1168736) and new [work-from-
home](https://www.nbcnews.com/better/lifestyle/7-ways-set-boundaries-when-
working-home-ncna1172131) policies, there are increasingly more people
navigating what may be uncharted waters. Instead of [tackling your to-do
list](https://www.nbcnews.com/shopping/tech-gadgets/best-tech-devices-
focus-n1164246) amid noisy interruptions, you can use a [pair of
headphones](https://www.nbcnews.com/shopping/tech-gadgets/best-active-noise-
cancelling-headphones-anc-apple-sony-bose-n1161786) to improve your focus. We
found some of the most popular true wireless earbuds on the market that may
improve your your day at home. Whether you need to hone in on a work project
or get in a quick workout, these headphones are worth considering.

####  _[Full coverage of the coronavirus
outbreak](https://www.nbcnews.com/health/coronavirus)_

## What are 'true wireless' earbuds?

](/shopping/audio/best-wireless-earbuds-headphones-n1093236#anchor-
Whataretruewirelessearbuds)

“True wireless” refers to Bluetooth-enabled earbuds that have zero wires
whatsoever. While some Bluetooth headphones — or _in-ear buds_ or _earbuds_ or
_'buds_ — still have a wire connecting the two earbuds to each other, true
wireless 'buds are literally two standalone earbuds. That means you have zero
chance of ending up with tangles in your pocket. It also means you can move
your head any which way while wearing them without the concern of pulling or
tugging on the wire connecting them. They are, in other words,
_truly_[wireless](https://www.nbcnews.com/shopping/tech-gadgets/best-wireless-
chargers-stands-n1097841).

They also virtually always come housed in a small case that, on top of storing
them for you when you're not using them, doubles as a charging pack. This
case, then, charges them for you as soon as you take them off and pop them
into it. There are many benefits to this approach, not least of which is
allowing you to use your earbuds for most of the day — and even draining their
batteries — without needing an outlet to [charge
them](https://www.nbcnews.com/shopping/tech-gadgets/best-portable-charger-
battery-shopping-guide-n1168581).

[

## Best wireless earbuds all-around: Jabra

](/shopping/audio/best-wireless-earbuds-headphones-n1093236#anchor-
BestwirelessearbudsallaroundJabra)

### 1\. [Jabra Elite 75t](https://www.amazon.com/Jabra-Elite-75t-Earbuds-
Comfortable/dp/B07X9VG6ZJ?tag=shopping-1093236-bestwirelessearbuds-20)

If you want a pair of true wireless earbuds that sound great and work well,
the [Jabra Elite 75t](https://smile.amazon.com/Jabra-Elite-75t-Earbuds-
Comfortable/dp/B07X9VG6ZJ?tag=shopping-1093236-bestwirelessearbuds-20) is
widely regarded as one of the best all-around sets you can buy. They’re small,
light, and have a bevy of touch controls so you can skip tracks, answer calls,
and activate your phone’s voice assistant without reaching for your phone.
They come with a “transparency mode” designed to allow in ambient sound,
letting you hear oncoming traffic (or your spouse or partner calling you from
the next room). The 75t has a [water resistance rating of
IP55](https://www.nbcnews.com/shopping/tech-gadgets/water-resistant-iphone-
apple-watch-tech-devices-guide-n1131051), which means they can handle rain and
some sweating, but their warranty doesn’t cover damage from perspiration, so
they aren’t ideal for hard workouts.

[![](https://media1.s-nbcnews.com/j/newscms/2019_48/3125621/c8519a9f-6f0a-4181-b8bc-5821026f847e-1-7ee256f12193ecbf6ae3c20916f25cd9-5de1254a3262d_87db8667e75e95eaf553625fb1c60ea2.fit-720w.jpeg)](https://www.amazon.com/Jabra-
Elite-75t-Earbuds-
Comfortable/dp/B07X9VG6ZJ?tag=shopping-1093236-bestwirelessearbuds-20)

[

[

## Best fitness wireless earbuds: Jaybird

](/shopping/audio/best-wireless-earbuds-headphones-n1093236#anchor-
BestfitnesswirelessearbudsJaybird)

### 2\. [Jaybird Vista True Wireless Bluetooth Sport
Earbuds](https://www.amazon.com/Jaybird-Wireless-Bluetooth-Waterproof-
Earbuds/dp/B07R9QJS9L?tag=shopping-1093236-bestwirelessearbuds-20)

When you’re headed out for a run and need some tunes — or podcasts or any
streamable content — to go with you, you want something like the [Jaybird
Vistas](https://www.amazon.com/Jaybird-Wireless-Bluetooth-Waterproof-
Earbuds/dp/B07R9QJS9L?tag=shopping-1093236-bestwirelessearbuds-20). They come
with IPX7 water resistance, meaning they’re water-tight even when immersed in
up to one meter for as long as 30 minutes. I wouldn’t recommend dunking them
in the water, but if you tend to sweat a lot while exercising, these’ll hold
up well. And if they don't,[ Jaybird's warranty covers damage from
perspiration](https://fave.co/34Cfq3G). Couple that with a small hook on each
'bud that keeps it in your ear while running, and you’ve got a workout buddy
that won’t quit on you.

## Best noise-cancelling earbuds: Sony

](/shopping/audio/best-wireless-earbuds-headphones-n1093236#anchor-
BestnoisecancellingearbudsSony)

### 3\. [Sony WF-1000XM3 Noise Canceling Truly Wireless Bluetooth
Earbuds](https://www.amazon.com/Sony-WF-1000XM3-Industry-Canceling-
Wireless/dp/B07T81554H?tag=shopping-1093236-bestwirelessearbuds-20)

While many earbuds merely isolate and block out noise using a "seal" in your
ear canal, active noise canceling (or ANC) operates differently. It relies on
microphones that record the noise around you and then play back a negative
waveform of that sound into your ears — making it sound like you’re in a quiet
room with your music. It’s effective in many ways, like drowning out the loud
hum of an airplane (especially constructive while you're inside of it). And
Sony has some of the most powerful noise canceling on the market in its
[WF-1000XM3](https://www.amazon.com/Sony-WF-1000XM3-Industry-Canceling-
Wireless/dp/B07T81554H?tag=shopping-1093236-bestwirelessearbuds-20) true
wireless earbuds. If you’re looking to truly block out the world, this is the
right pair for you.

[![](https://media1.s-nbcnews.com/j/newscms/2019_48/3127126/316w4jqrlzl-5de2acf9452f1_80e514d240109e4b116c1e74fbb7e50c.fit-720w.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/Sony-
WF-1000XM3-Industry-Canceling-
Wireless/dp/B07T81554H?tag=shopping-1093236-bestwirelessearbuds-20)

## Best wireless earbuds for Apple users: AirPods, AirPods Pro, and Powerbeats
Pro

](/shopping/audio/best-wireless-earbuds-headphones-n1093236#anchor-
BestwirelessearbudsforAppleusersAirPodsAirPodsProandPowerbeatsPro)

### 4\. [Apple AirPods](https://www.amazon.com/Apple-AirPods-Charging-Latest-
Model/dp/B07PXGQC1Q?tag=shopping-1093236-bestwirelessearbuds-20)

Apple didn’t just bring true wireless technology into the mainstream — they
made their own [AirPods](https://www.amazon.com/Apple-AirPods-Charging-Latest-
Model/dp/B07PXGQC1Q?tag=shopping-1093236-bestwirelessearbuds-20) very easy to
use. Bluetooth has always had some quirks, for example, and Apple’s H1 chip
smoothed out the pairing process and stabilized its connection. You can even
activate Siri with your voice (as long as you’re pairing your earbuds to an
[iPhone](https://fave.co/2OBxV2M), [iPad](https://fave.co/37TZxYv), or
[Mac](https://fave.co/2r01ulr)).

[![](https://media4.s-nbcnews.com/j/newscms/2019_48/3127146/31pshruoihl-5de2b17f7a384_c39de8d5342357864c0a7f2d5bc2936e.fit-720w.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/Apple-
AirPods-Charging-Latest-
Model/dp/B07PXGQC1Q?tag=shopping-1093236-bestwirelessearbuds-20)

## Best affordable wireless earbuds: Anker and TaoTronics

](/shopping/audio/best-wireless-earbuds-headphones-n1093236#anchor-
BestaffordablewirelessearbudsAnkerandTaoTronics)

Most of the earbuds on this list are well over $100 — and substantial
investments for those looking to make them — because wireless buds have a lot
more tech packed inside compared to their wired counterparts. But if you’re on
a budget and really want to ditch the cables, you have options.

### 7\. [Anker Soundcore Liberty Neo](https://www.amazon.com/Soundcore-
Bluetooth-Headphones-Noise-Canceling-
Sweatproof/dp/B07MCGZK3B?tag=shopping-1093236-bestwirelessearbuds-20)

[Anker’s Soundcore Liberty Neo](https://smile.amazon.com/Soundcore-Bluetooth-
Headphones-Noise-Canceling-Sweatproof/dp/B07MCGZK3B) come in at less than $50
and sport a lightweight build that is IPX7-rated water resistant (sweating
while wearing them is okay). They won’t sound quite as good as the premium
options above but they’ll certainly do the job.
